subject: Dear Sir/Madam,
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,
The above subject matter refers, please. It is with utmost good faith,
but with a great sense of responsibility that I make this offer to
you.
My name is Dr James Johnson Emefiele. I am the younger brother to the
former governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), Mr Godwin
Emefiele who was recently removed and detained by the government. Ever
since his detention, we the immediate family, are monitored and
hounded by Security Agents and all our accounts illegally frozen. We
have been in constant fear for our lives, as we are no more safe in
Nigeria.
Before his incarceration and detention however, my brother has amassed
the sum of USD 50 MILLION, which is presently off shore, and intended
for investment with a good return in investment. It is this funds we
want you to invest on behalf of our family, however subject to
agreement.
Please let me know how you want to be remunerated in this transaction.
Kindly therefore, advise your interest, so that I can furnish you with
further and better information.
Kind regards,
James Johnson Emefiele.

subject: Re:   Dear Sir/Madam,
body:
Hello James Johnson Emefiele,

Thank you for reaching out to me with such an interesting proposition. I'm sorry to hear about the troubles your family is facing in Nigeria, it must be a challenging time for all of you.

I'm intrigued by your offer and would like to understand more about it. Could you please provide more details about the investment? What kind of return are we talking about here? And what type of investment are you considering?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Audrey
